long_description: Small but mighty, the lightweight Benchmade 556 Mini-Griptilian knife features a tough stainless-steel blade, molded handle and smooth AXIS(TM) locking mechanism in a compact design. Stainless-steel blade is strong and sharp enough to slice through food, wire and ropes with ease. Ambidextrous blade is easily opened with a simple push of the thumb-stud openers. Molded nylon handle is lightweight and easy to grip; features lanyard hole for an alternate carry option (lanyard not included). Reversible pocket clip makes storage and transport easy-just clip it on your pocket or belt and go!
short_description: Small but mighty, the lightweight Benchmade 556 Mini-Griptilian knife features a tough stainless-steel blade, molded handle and smooth AXIS(TM) locking mechanism in a compact design.
